title: The Question is ``Who can install alarm in my car?``

posts.text:
Who can install alarm in my car?


Where I can make it? How much is this gonna cost me?

I would call NesRadio in the morning and ask them
Do you have the Alarm System or are you looking into buying the system from the guy hows going to install it for you?

I dont know, I think I looking into buying the system from the guy hows going to install it for me


and becouse I have you know Central Lock (every locks opening if I put key to lock and turn it )



But I want to open it not from Key (put in lock) i want to open it from pilot

Like here: <<<icon_smile.gif>>>





that my friend who have this account tell me that If I want open locks from pilot I have to buy Alarm , er það ekki ? <<<icon_smile.gif>>><<<icon_smile.gif>>>
What kind of a car do you have?
At first I want to make it in my MMC LANCER.

You could call Hekla and ask them if they have a remote for the car
If not you can buy a central locking system from Nesradio for not that much
Thank you so much for answer.
